parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> {<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"float: right; font-size: 0.9em; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1.5em"
! colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"2" <template><title>!</title></template> Maximum number of<br>units per group
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <template><title>ofp</title></template> <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 12
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <template><title>arma1</title></template> <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 144
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <template><title>arma2</title></template><template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> ?
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> <template><title>arma3</title></template> <template><title>!</title></template><template><title>!</title></template> 3000+
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}
Join all units in the array to given group. 

To have a group member leave a group, join him with the [[grpNull]] group (e.g. <tt>[guy1] [[join]] [[grpNull]]</tt>), but '''beware''', as brand new group is created for the leaving unit and this could result in the number of groups in a mission growing out of control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitArray '''join''' group

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitArray: [[Array]] - units to join group

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] or [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_unitOne, _unitTwo] [[join]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[_unitOne, _unitTwo] [[join]] ([[group]] [[player]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[joinAs]], [[joinAsSilent]], [[joinSilent]], [[group]], [[leader]]
</value></part></template>
